transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Hello
Executive: Ha, Dattani ji namaskar, Anurag baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya bolo bolo.
Executive: Ji, Sat Sri Akal Dattani ji. Aapne ek request dali thi video meeting ke liye?
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo maine na wo mujhe laga ki kal mujhe aaya tha na jo call video calling ke liye wo hamara jo set tha wo banna hai wo mujhe laga. Kal abhi aaya tha uska video call.
Executive: Achcha, karwa di aapne KYC?
Customer: Ha ha, wo karwa diya.
Executive: Achcha achcha uske liye aaya tha. Ye mistake achcha galti se ho gaya tha. Koi issue nahi hai abhi main isko close kar raha hu. Ye yaha pe ticket open ho gaya tha to aapke paas ek feedback aayega. Usko satisfy se aap reply kar dena. Baki catalog mein to aapne sare product dalwa diye na unpe?
Customer: Ha, wo to hai hi already hai hi usme.
Executive: Ha, aur aur agar kuch bhi add on karwane hai na. Baki baki maybe aapke account manager hai. Mera number aapke paas hai hi. Directly aap mujhe bhi call kar sakte ho sir.
Customer: Okay, ab wo ye live ho gaya ki abhi abhi der lagegi wo karega please live hoga.
Executive: Live ho gaya abhi matlab abhi aapki video meeting hui hai na just.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Subah 10 baje, 10 baje hui thi na?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ha to bas ye live services to live aapki ho jayegi aage.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Aaj hi maximum aaj hi aaj wo okay karke sab kuch kar dega. Aapka certificate bhi TrustSeal ka wo deliver ho jayega us site pe thode time mein.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai jo hard copy aayega wo bhi aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Main abhi isko close kar raha hu aapke paas feedback aayega to ek bar satisfy se reply kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay, aur sir ye mera jo customer ke representative hai wo koi ladka nahi hai?
Executive: Ladka chahiye aapko koi?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Chaliye main change kara deta hu. Jo jo usme jo uska jo experience ho na aisa person.
Executive: Ha main experience person aapko de deta hu don't worry. Ek purana aadmi main aapko assign kara deta hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aapko wo acche se guide bhi kar payega. Theek hai to main aapko kar deta hu assign don't worry.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay thank you sir. Reply kar dijiyega please satisfy.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Thought video call was for pending work.

- Wants experienced male customer representative.



Resolution:

- Clarified video call was for KYC.

- Assured experienced male representative will be assigned.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, kyc, trustseal, customer representative
